EmailTemplate.name: RE: Forthcoming contract (1349991541.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Forthcoming contract (1349991541.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Rianna, On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for independent consultants and small businsses <http://www.mbopartners.com/#howwehelp> who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficiently and safely with their contract workforce <http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help>. We have also put together a short one page collateral <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> that explains how we work and the markets we serve. I look forward to being introduced to the appropriate contact at the World Bank so we can get the paperwork in place and discuss next steps. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. -----Original Message----- From: Alan Fairbank [mailto:fairbanka@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, October 11, 2012 4:23 PM To: rmohammed@worldbank.org Cc: Sara Conde Subject: Forthcoming contract Dear Rianna: I have recently signed up with MBO Partners to facilitate my back office, billing, expenses, insurance, etc. I would like to introduce you to Sara Conde, she is my contact at MBO Partners. Sara will be in touch with you (that is, with the contract officer) to discuss paperwork and next steps. If you would like to learn a little more about MBO Partners, please click on this URL: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVBQp0V35feYAq7gnjzMNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVBQp0V35feYAq7gnjzMNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Could you please forward this to the appropriate person in the Bank?And, let me know who Sara should call to discuss this. Thanks. Cheers,Alan--Alan Fairbank, PhD77 Leetes Island RoadGuilford, CT 06437 USA+1-203-453-6828+1-203-812-9695 mobileemail: fairbanka@gmail.com <mailto:fairbanka@gmail.com>
